ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Medley Overhaul
ygData.msgSnippet: So if I get Engulfing Darknessed, I can Chain myself and break it?  That would be useful at times. Kit ... From: kim@stormhaven.org [mailto:kim@stormhaven.org]
ygData.messageBody:
So if I get Engulfing Darknessed, I can Chain myself and break it? That
would be useful at times.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 13, 2000 10:43 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Medley Overhaul


On Wed, 12 Apr 2000, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:

> Not a problem as we are currently Shaman-less. Our only shaman has passed
> us all up by so much that we hardly ever see him anymore. What's up with
> the Engulfing Darkness line interfering with/being cancelled by Chains?
> Exactly how has this been working?

Previously, Chain would overwrite both engulfing darkness and
snare, canceling the two spells. Once Chain was on, neither
spell would stick. Now it seems engulfing darkness and Chain
will trade off.
--
John H. Kim
kim@...
